issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Remove duplicates in function registries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5891](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5891). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Each precompiled function should have at most one "NativeFunction" entry in the registry. No two function signatures can refer the same precompiled function. Also add a UnitTest which checks if there are duplicates

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5891?focusedCommentId=16897011) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4853
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4853>
